name: Ash
tagline: The first AI designed for therapy
description: We all might need some help with our mental health. I used Ash and was blown away by how helpful it was at 2 AM. It remembered our conversations, and even challenged me, providing valuable insights. Isn't it crazy how AI can make us feel more human?

name: Well Embed
tagline: Streamline payables with robots chasing invoices & receipts
description: Still asking your users to upload receipts and invoices? Well does it for you‚Äîautomatically. We have built an AI-native infrastructure that craft APIs to retrieve invoices & receipts from any web portal.

name: Company Dataset
tagline: Full company data on millions of profile
description: Power your product or AI Agent with billions of datapoints on millions of companies, refreshed monthly. Build your AI SDR, recruiting platform, internal or commercial sales or marketing tools, or update your CRM with Crustdata's Full Company Dataset.

name: Lovable Agent Mode
tagline: Lovable now thinks, plans, and acts on its own
description: Lovable's new Agent Mode (Beta) lets your AI think, plan, and take action on its own. It explores code, fixes bugs, fetches resources, and summarizes changes‚Äîall autonomously. Save time, reduce errors, and build smarter with AI that truly helps.

name: ZumiGames
tagline: Your AI pet with a mind (and adventures) of its own
description: Craft your own AI pet with a unique personality, and send them on adventures in their pocket world! They'll return with stories, friends, and surprises. A multiplayer twist on virtual pet care with evolving personalities.

name: THEO 2.0
tagline: Business Context Engineering Made Simple for Marketing Teams
description: Optimize business info to be used as AI memory for consistently high-quality outputs with 5-10x fewer iterations required across AI tools & team -Tailored to Marketing tasks -Info quality scoring & refinements -Multi-product/audience management -API/Zapier/MCP

name: Mantle Starter
tagline: Free cap table management platform for early-stage founders
description: Mantle Starter is a free cap table platform for early-stage teams. With unlimited stakeholders, one-click exports, and scenario planning, it gives startups the structure to grow‚Äîwithout the cost or complexity.

name: GitHub Spark
tagline: AI platform for building + deploying full-stack apps
description: GitHub Spark helps you transform your ideas into full-stack intelligent apps and publish with a single click.

name: Microtica AI Incident Investigator
tagline: An AI Agent that tells you why your systems break
description: Microtica‚Äôs Incident Investigator is an AI Agent that tells you why your systems break. It analyzes logs, deploys, and configs to surface the root cause ‚Äî fast. No more dashboard hunting. Just context, clarity, and confidence in your incident response.

name: DeepDocs
tagline: Fix your outdated GitHub Docs on autopilot
description: Outdated docs frustrate users and slow down teams ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. We built DeepDocs, a GitHub-native AI agent that automatically keeps your docs like READMEs, API references, SDK guides, and tutorials up-to-date with your changing codebase.

name: Tinybird Code
tagline: The AI ClickHouse¬Æ expert you don't have to hire
description: Tinybird Code is a CLI agent with deep ClickHouse knowledge. Use it to develop, deploy, iterate, optimize, and scale your real-time data pipelines - from idea to production and beyond.

name: Bee
tagline: Always‚Äëon personal AI wearable
description: Bee is a $49 AI-powered wearable that listens, summarizes your conversations, builds daily insights & reminders, and supports 40 languages. With 7-day battery life and strong privacy controls, it‚Äôs like a second brain right on your wrist or clip.

name: Synthetic Users
tagline: AI users to test your app, catch bugs, and give feedback
description: Jina's synthetic users act like your real users. They run QA tests, catch bugs you didn't know existed, and give you feedback on how to improve your app. Completely autonomously.

name: Cursor Memories
tagline: Memory system for Cursor agents
description: A CLI tool for storing and searching development memories, insights, and patterns using Cursor Rules, Supabase, and OpenAI embeddings.

name: Knock Knock
tagline: A video chat doorbell for websites
description: Transform web visits into sales with a blend of AI and human connection. Engage visitors through real-time behavior tracking, live navigation insights, and instant video calls. Deliver personalized experiences, boost conversions, and build trust.

name: Elastic Copilot
tagline: AI coding agent for  VS code
description: Elastic Copilot is an AI agent for‚ÄØVS Code that codes end‚Äëto‚Äëend. It plans and writes features, understands huge codebases, fixes bugs, writes docs and runs browser, terminal and CI tasks. Built on Claude, GPT and Gemini; full‚Äëcontext coding.

name: SnapLinear
tagline: Auto-generate Linear tasks from meeting transcripts
description: Web app that automatically extracts actions items from meeting recordings/transcripts and converts them into tasks in Linear using AI.

name: Naiad Lens
tagline: Stop coding blind. See every flow in one click.
description: Naiad Lens is an IDE plugin that auto-draws interactive architecture, sequence, and file-level diagrams. Click any node to open the exact line of code. Understand legacy projects, onboard faster, and navigate like you‚Äôve been there before.

name: AI-Flow
tagline: One canvas with endless AI combos
description: AI‚ÄëFlow is a no‚Äëcode AI orchestration studio that empowers anyone‚Äîfrom non‚Äëcoders to developers‚Äîto build and run smart workflows using drag‚Äëand‚Äëdrop simplicity. Available in the cloud for instant use or self‚Äëhosted open‚Äësource.

name: AIOHM
tagline: WordPress AI with dual-mode KB management
description: AIOHM is the first WordPress AI assistant with dual modes: Mirror for public Q&A and Muse for private content creation. Manage your knowledge base, train AI in your brand voice, and deliver authentic, on-brand answers - right inside WordPress.
